commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Do not update the gutter when opening a document
commits.body:
For documents which have status other than none (or unknown) the command will already be called due to ‘callback.document.did-change-scm-status’.

Requires TextMate 2.0-rc.20.

commits.author: Stefan Daschek
commits.summary: Fix error in “Update Gutter” for non-UTF-8 encodings
